name: Macaroni and Egg
author: In Memory of Mrs. Theon (Ella) Schlosser, Charlotte Hooper
instructions:
Boil macaroni until done. Drain well. Place margarine in skillet and melt. Add macaroni and eggs. Cook until eggs are done.
This recipe is from Mrs. Theon (Ella) J. Schlosser Sr. We as a family used it a lot on the farm especially during Lent and on Fridays
